title: New: BATTS – Lie To Me
body:
This latest track from Melbourne’s **BATTS** is quite possibly her finest moment yet – merging elements of the likes of Lapsley and London Grammar, it’s beautifully lovelorn and searingly honest.

Produced by Birmingham producer Ficci at a converted barn in northern England, it’s further indication that BATTS is set for an impressive 2017. Check out _Lie To Me_ below.

Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
